comments:
The viewWorkSchedule.jsp file in the attached web project cause the stack trace below in the VPD and cause it not to load.

Workaround: right-click file, Open With...-> Text Editor, remove comments, save, re-open in VPD. Notably, SSE will load it, but puts (no stack trace) warnings in the log.
